Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to manufactured homes certificate of title and the conveyance and encumbrance of manufactured homes as real property
Summary: Relates to manufactured homes' certificate of title and the conveyance and encumbrance of manufactured homes as real property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the banking law, the personal property law, the vehicle and traffic law and the real property law, in relation to manufactured home certificates of title, and the conveyance and encumbrance of manufactured homes as real property
